snippet: A case religious leaders and Second Amendment groups are closely watching hinges on whether keeping weapons out of houses of worship violates religious freedom.
lead_paragraph: A case religious leaders and Second Amendment groups are closely watching hinges on whether keeping weapons out of houses of worship violates religious freedom.

headline.main: In Georgia, a Lawsuit Over Guns in Church
headline.print_headline: In Georgia, a Lawsuit Over Guns in Church
headline.seo: In Georgia, a Lawsuit Over Guns in Church
